name: css-split
description: split css into different parts by selector number

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-local
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -r thunk-mocha test/**/*.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test-cov
scripts.beta: npm test && git release $npm_package_version && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release: npm test && npm-ensure -t changelog && git release $npm_package_version && npm publish

author: zoujie.wzj
